events.message: I received my order last week but I am not satisfied with the product and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been categorized under the Refund cluster based on the customer’s request for money back.
A customer service representative has been assigned to your refund case to assist you further.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I’m here to help with your refund request and make this process smooth for you.
Could you please provide the order number and the reason for requesting the refund to help us process it quickly?
My order number is 123456789. The product did not match the description on your website, and I would like a full refund.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate the refund immediately and you should see the money back in your account within 5-7 business days.
That sounds good to me. I appreciate your quick response and help with the refund process.
The refund request has been processed successfully and your case is now resolved. Please contact us if you need further assistance.
We are following up to ensure your refund was received and that you are satisfied with the resolution provided.
Since we have not heard back, your refund case has been closed. Thank you for contacting customer support.
We have sent you a survey to rate your support experience and help us improve our service.
